text:
Katerina's Chaos

Katerina Ivanovna, frantic in her emotions  
A storm brews inside her mind  
Katerina: "Why can't they just be happy?"  

Katerina: "One little disaster sends me spiraling!"  
Katerina: "I can't take this anymore!"  

---

Amalia Ivanovna, proud and poised  
Satisfaction in her meticulous preparations  
Amalia: "Everything is perfect for them!"  

Katerina: "Why are you so proud?"  
Amalia: "I did this for you, Katerina!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna's emotional instability leads her to oscillate between adoration and contempt for those around her, particularly Amalia Ivanovna, whose efforts she simultaneously respects and resents.
